mapper.insert: INSERT INTO msq_dynamic_push ( id, title,push_type,author,pubdate,push_status,content, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, del ) VALUE ( #{id}, #{title}, #{pushType},#{createUser.loginName},#{pubdate},#{pushStatus},#{content}, #{createDate}, #{createUser.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser.id}, '0' )
mapper.select:
select * from msq_dynamic_push where del=0
and title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
and push_type like concat('%', #{pushType}, '%')
ORDER BY id desc
mapper.update: UPDATE msq_dynamic_push m SET m.push_type = #{pushType}, m.title= #{title}, m.author = #{author}, m.content=#{content}, m.update_user = #{updateUser.id} WHERE m.id = #{id}
